My Name Is Nadav And i'm a

See My Work

My name is Nadav Shor I am a self-taught Full-Stack developer and a creative Front-End designer with experience working with clients and on self-projects. I have a passion for creating incredible user experiences and visuals with code.

I have completed multiple online courses and have a working experience in topics like full-stack web development, javascript, React, nodeJS, html, css, mongoDB, ui/ux design, SQL, data analysis, python and more. currently working with clients and on my own big scale projects.

I am creative and an out of the box thinker, a fast learner and problem solver. always wanting to learn about new technologies and ways to create even more amazing websites and web apps.
